00028 inline std::size_t log2_base(boost::uintmax_t n, std::size_t maxbits) {
00029     boost::uintmax_t lo = 0, hi = maxbits;
00030     while (lo < hi) {
00031         boost::uintmax_t s = lo + ((hi - lo) >> 1);
00032         if (n >= (boost::uintmax_t(1) << s)) lo = s + 1;
00033         else hi = s;
00034     }
00035     return std::size_t(lo);
00036 }

00038 template <typename T>
00039 std::size_t log2_helper(const T n,
00040     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type* = 0)
00041 {
00042     return log2_base(n, std::numeric_limits<T>::digits);
00043 }
00044 
00045 template <typename T>
00046 std::size_t log2_helper(const T n,
00047     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type* = 0)
00048 {
00049     typedef typename boost::make_unsigned<T>::type uT;
00050     T nn = (n < 0 ? -n : n);
00051     return log2_base(static_cast<uT>(nn), std::numeric_limits<T>::digits);
00052 }
00053 
00054 template <typename T>
00055 std::size_t log2(const T n,
00056     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0)
00057 {
00058     return log2_helper(n);
00059 }

00061 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00062 std::size_t log2(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT &n) {
00063     std::size_t r = bits_per_digit * (n.length - 1);
00064     return r + log2(n[n.length - 1]);
00065 }
